title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Technology Integration Competency Development Program for Prospective Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can explain how to use three or more digital tools (apps, web tools, etc.) suitable for math lesson design.
Learners can create a technology-integrated lesson plan implementable in a mobile environment and incorporate peer feedback.
Trainees can design project-based assessment models utilizing technology-based math assessment tools (quiz apps, collaboration platforms, etc.).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
